Career Profile

Results-oriented operations director. With 20 years of experience in managing technology teams and stimulating innovation to achieve business goals. A proven track record in developing and implementing technology and management strategies aimed at promoting a collaborative environment and responsibility to improve operations.

Looking for a technical director position to leverage my expertise in leadership and strategic planning.

Experiences

Head of Global Datacenters & Cloud Services

2020 - Present
Sodexo, Issy-les-Moulineaux

Defined and implemented the IT strategy for the Datacenters and Cloud services to implement a scalable, secure and high-performance infrastructure to support the organization’s global business needs. Set the vision and direction for streamlining IT operations, with a focus on reducing manual workloads and improving service delivery across the organization.

  • Managed a multidiciplinary and international team (20 people).
  • Managed a multi-million euros budget, ensuring all IT investments support the company’s long-term financial and strategic goals.
  • Established the strategic priorities for IT asset management, including the procurement, lifecycle management, and optimization of company assets.
  • Implemented hyperconverged datacenter blueprint, reducing datacenter surface by 30%.
  • Led the global virtualization strategy.
  • Led the RFP and transition to new Management Service Provider.
  • Implemented Datadog and observability processes.
  • Implemented Tanium for endpoint management and increased patching conformity from 60% to 98%.
  • Led the IT for IT developments for tools integration and automation.
  • Implemented a global TCO model to link the recharges with the expenses.
  • Responsible for Incident Management, Problem Management and Knowledge Management.
  • Accountable for internal audit.

Global Datacenter & Cloud Services Manager

2017 - 2020
Sodexo, Issy-les-Moulineaux
  • Management of the operations managers team.
